name: Mino-Mayhem
description:
One player is the Minotaur, and should find the humans and crush them.

The other ones should find the portal to escape.

You need to connect to steam to be able to play multiplayer.

Min 2 player, max 4.

Click Host and wait for your friends to join.

When all you clients menus have dissapeared, you can click on start game.

Move with WASD.

Use skills with QERF.

Further help inside the game.
